channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Social Pixel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Social Pixel

item.title: CVE-2024-4005|2024-06-14T06:00:04.285Z -- unknown -- social%20pixel
item.description: The Social Pixel WordPress plugin through 2.1 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
